data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Vourey, Elodie, Dupoux, Cyndie, Harold, Antony Scott (2017): A new species of Polyipnus (Stomiiformes: Sternoptychidae) from the Western South Pacific. Zootaxa 4263 (3): 567-577, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4263.3.8|2 occurrences
